#### RIF Regressions

[pyrifreg](https://github.com/vyasenov/pyrifreg) - Recentered Influence Function (RIF) regression analysis following [Firpo et al. (2008)](https://doi.org/10.3982/ECTA6822)

#### Changes-in-Changes

[pycinc](https://github.com/vyasenov/pycinc) - Changes-in-Changes (CiC) model introduced by [Athey and Imbens (2006)](https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1468-0262.2006.00668.x)

#### Lee Bounds

[pyleebounds](https://github.com/vyasenov/pyleebounds) - Treatment effect bounds accounting for sample selection developed by [Lee (2009)](https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1467-937X.2009.00536.x)

#### Double Post-Lasso

[pydoublelasso](https://github.com/vyasenov/pydoublelasso) - Double-post lasso treatment effect estimation based on [Belloni et al. (2014)](https://doi.org/10.1093/restud/rdt044)

#### Lasso for Heterogeneous Treatment Effects

[pyhtelasso](https://github.com/vyasenov/pyhtelasso) - [Debiased lasso](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.5555/2627435.2697057) for simple detection of treatment effect heterogeneity in randomized experiments
